nodes.text: Oolas was the male captain of the Steadfast during Operation Flotsam. He came from a planet that had never been occupied by the Galactic Empire. His species possessed upper tentacles and a narrow neck.

In 16 ABY, Oolas served in the New Republic Defense Fleet as captain of the Steadfast. Together with Lieutenant Norda Proi, he and his team destroyed a couple of Imperial ships in order to search them for information, for which the Steadfast was equipped with the latest technology. This mission was known as Operation Flotsam. Thus, the Republic acted on the appearance of artifacts that both the Empire and the Rebel Alliance kept on the black market.
